title: Drawing, "Elevation of a Small Round Domed Room"
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on laid paper
inscribed: "dedicato a Apollo/ nei rombi le nove muse/ nei quadri diver [s]e composi/ di mitologia/ il fregio le guera/ troiani." Below, at right, part of another caption: "terz/ p./"
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Veritical rectangle. Divided into triangular panels with lozenges above, picture below. Caption: "dedicato a Apollo/ nei rombi le nove muse/ nei quadri diver [s]e composi/ di mitologia/ il fregio le guera/ troiani." Center: door and walls divided by pillars into panels. Sofas left and right. Below, at right, part of another caption: "terz/ p./"

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Elevation of a Small Round Domed Room". Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1378.
